name: alexandrie
tagline: A self-hosted Rust package registry for publishing and managing private crates
description: Alexandrie is a Rust-based self-hosted crates registry, designed as an alternative to crates.io. It lets users host their own Rust package repository with search, publishing, and web browsing support, ideal for private package hosting.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Fast search across all hosted crates and versions. Find packages instantly

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse packages through clean, intuitive web UI. Easy package discovery

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Manage who can publish and access your packages. Secure your proprietary code

features.title: Version Management
features.description: Handle multiple versions and dependencies automatically. Reliable dependency resolution

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Fast, safe, and reliable implementation in Rust. Performance you can trust

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your Rust package infrastructure. Your code, your server
